author: Anonymous Gear
title: Check syntax vs Runinng
question:
Hello.

I was wondering if running a program successfully without any error would guarantee that we also pass the syntax check? Thank you!
instructor_answer:
Yes.  Check syntax is the first thing DrRacket does as part of running a program.  So if it runs it also checks syntax.
If it runs WITH NO "RED ERRORS" - error messages in red - then the autograder should be able to do at least partial grading.
